price: ኑሕንና የመርከቢቱንም ጓዶች አዳናቸው፡፡ እርሷንም ለዓለማት ተዓምር አደረግናት፡፡
arabic: فَأَنجَيۡنَٰهُ وَأَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلسَّفِينَةِ وَجَعَلۡنَٰهَآ ءَايَةٗ لِّلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-anjaynāhu wa-aṣḥāba al-safīnati wajaʿalnāhā āyatan lil'ʿālamīna
